channel.title: How to add custom titlebuttons in a client?
channel.description: I tried doing this the way I did it with my title box, no luck. Anyone mind helping me?

item.title: How to add custom titlebuttons in a client?
item.dc:creator: @zeldaownsyou zeldaownsyou
item.description:
@zeldaownsyou wrote:

i know how to do it.

first, goto your client.
next, open it.
then click on client and open it with notepad then when opened, hit ctrl+f and a window should pop up.

type log in

and it should find

  aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2_967.method361(i1 - 73, 16083, l1 - 20);
            aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffffff, i1, anInt939, "@whi@Log in", l1 + 5, true);
            i1 = c / 2 + 80;
            aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2_967.method361(i1 - 73, 16083, l1 - 20);
            aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method382(0xffffff, i1, anInt939, "@whi@Cancel", l1 + 5, true);

change @whi@log in" to what ever you want like @red@click here!

colors:

@(first 3 letters of color here)@ ex: @gre@

Read full topic
